# f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group` resource manages Site Mesh Groups in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Site Mesh Groups enable network connectivity between sites in a service mesh topology.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group" "example" {
  name      = "my-mesh-group"
  namespace = "system"
  type      = "SITE_MESH_GROUP_TYPE_FULL_MESH"

  virtual_site {
    name      = "my-virtual-site"
    namespace = "shared"
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `type` (String) Type of site mesh group (SITE_MESH_GROUP_TYPE_FULL_MESH, SITE_MESH_GROUP_TYPE_HUB_SPOKE).
- `virtual_site` (Block List) Virtual sites to include in the mesh group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--virtual_site))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--virtual_site"></a>
### Nested Schema for `virtual_site`

Required:

- `name` (String) Name of the virtual site.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace of the virtual site.
